Note.text: All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.

1x TRIPLE Estimated total amount of taxes & fees for this booking: 7.26 Euro payable on arrival.Car park YES (with additional debit notes) 23.00 EUR Per unit/night. Check-in hour - . Minimum check-in age 18..

CancellationPolicy.text: Cancellation made less than 2 days (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 46% of the total booking value.
Cancellation made less than 1 day (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 50% of the total booking value.
